PROJECTS

Sudoku Solver

  • Engineered Sudoku solver to solve puzzle boards of any difficulty level
  • Utilized backtracking algorithms and recursion to achieve 100% solve rate
  • Optimized modular code for improved readability and maintainability

2048 Game

  • Developed front-end web framework using HTML5 semantic markup and CSS3 flex-box layout optimized for desktop
  • Programmed object-oriented JavaScript logic handling game state, board generation, tile placement, and win condition checking to provide smooth interactivity
  • Leveraged the power of transitions to give the game a smooth outlook

Personal Website

  • Developed a user-friendly layout and a space-like background to give a visually powerful feel
  • Used div tags within hyperlink 'a' tag to make sure that clicking a project over the div opens the project
  • Wrote the CSS using tailwind to make the code faster about 63% than normal CSS styling
  • Faded the background at some places to make the text more readable and used transition to make the animation look smooth
